metadata.description: The data set includes cumulative 3-D deformation variables recorded by 50 continuous and mobile GPS stations 5 years after the 2015 mw7.8 Nepal earthquake. Data from published articles: Zhang, J., Zhao, B., Wang, D., Yu, J., and tan, K. (2021), dynamic modeling of postseismic deformation following the 2015 MW 7.8 Gorkha earth, Nepal, J. Asian Earth SCI., 215104781, Doi: 10.1016/j.jseaes.2021.104781. The post earthquake deformation data processing process is as follows: firstly, the original observation data are processed to obtain the time series under ITRF reference frame; Then, other effects unrelated to the Nepal earthquake, such as seasonal variation, interannual variation, plate effect, etc., are corrected; Thirdly, the post earthquake time series curve is fitted by logarithmic function; Finally, the post earthquake deformation of any period is calculated by fitting the curve. Five years after the earthquake, the accumulated deformation is nearly 13.8 cm. The horizontal accuracy is not less than 0.6cm, and the vertical accuracy is not less than 2.0cm.
metadata.descriptionCn: 该数据集包括50个连续及流动GPS台站记录的2015年Mw7.8尼泊尔地震震后5年累积三维形变量。数据来自已发表文章：Zhang, J., Zhao, B., Wang, D., Yu, J., and Tan, K. (2021), Dynamic modeling of postseismic deformation following the 2015 Mw 7.8 Gorkha earthquake, Nepal, J. Asian Earth Sci., 215,104781, doi: 10.1016/j.jseaes.2021.104781. 震后形变数据处理过程如下：首先处理原始观测数据得到ITRF参考系下的时间序列；然后矫正和尼泊尔地震无关的其他影响，例如季节变化，年际变化，板块效应等；再次，通过对数函数拟合震后时间序列曲线；最后，通过拟合曲线计算任意时间段震后形变量。震后5年累积形变高达近13.8厘米。水平方向精度不低于0.6厘米，垂直方向不低于2.0厘米。

background: The MHT system is a detachment surface between the subducting Indian Plate and the Eurasian Plate and accommodates a high convergence rate of ~20 mm/yr. Records show that there have been a handful of strong earthquakes along the central Himalaya arc, such as the 1505 Mw > 8.2 Lo Mustang earthquake, 1833 Mw 7.7 Kathmandu earthquake, 1934 Mw 8.2 Bihar-Nepal earthquake. Postseismic transient deformation of mantle and crustal rocks is the mechanical response to stress perturbations generated by large earthquakes. The primary mechanisms of postseismic stress relaxation comprise aseismic slip in the periphery of the coseismic rupture area and viscoelastic relaxation in the lower crust and upper mantle and poroelastic rebound in the shallow crust around the fault. In recent decades, more and more geophysicists have employed three-dimensional finite element method to simulate postseismic evolution, which can solve some problems that are challenging to the traditional analytical or semi-analytical methods.
research objective: We develop three-dimensional finite element models incorporating a subducting India slab to investigate the dynamic mechanisms of postseismic deformation processes following the 2015 Mw 7.8 Gorkha earthquake based on nearly 5 years of GPS data in Nepal and southern Tibet. In this work, we present three-dimensional finite-element models (FEM) consisting of subducting Indian slab to constrain the rheological properties of the lower crust in the southern Tibetan Plateau and the frictional properties of the MHT using dense GPS observations spanning nearly 5 years both in Nepal and the southern Tibet.
challenges: However, the employed GPS data were either confined in Nepal or located hundreds of kilometer away from the rupture in the southern Tibet region. There was almost no data at approximately 150 – 250 km (intermediate-field) from the rupture area in Tibet. There are still several controversies about the distribution of the inferred afterslip and the Indian-Asian tectonic plate boundary below Tibet. In addition, most of the aforementioned postseismic modeling effects of the Gorkha earthquake adopted analytic or semi-analytic methods of dislocations theory in a homogeneous or layered elastic half-space. There may be a bias in their slip models due to the strong lateral heterogeneous rheological structure in the study area.
methods: We initially investigate the pattern of postseismic deformation from individual stress-driven afterslip and viscoelastic relaxation, and then address the contributions of combined mechanisms by meticulously evaluating the misfit between the simulated and observed surface displacements. We process the raw GPS data using the GAMIT/GLOBK version 10.7 processing software.
dataset: We also collected the observations of three continuous GPS (cGPS) stations and previously unpublished data at 7 campaign GPS stations (J040, JB54, J339, J030, J337, J038, J338) in the southern Tibet from the Crustal Movement Observation Network of China (CMONOC).
findings: The preferred combined model reproduces the postseismic deformation associated with the Gorkha earthquake and indicates that near- to intermediate-field postseismic displacements are mainly caused by aseismic slip on the downdip of the coseismic rupture, while the far-field deformation is dominated by viscoelastic relaxation in the lower crust and upper mantle of the southern Tibet. The steady-state viscosity of the lower crust in the southern Tibet is estimated to be 3 × 10^18 Pa s, corresponding transient-state viscosity is 3 × 10^17 Pa s. The best-fit combined model suggests that approximately 90% afterslip was released in the first 4 years and corresponding frictional parameter a σ = 0.15 MPa. Additionally, we find the afterslip fringing the downdip of the coseismic rupture plays an important role in the trade-off between near- and intermediate-field displacements. Afterslip deficit in the shallow part of the Main Himalayan Thrust indicates the potential seismic hazard on the south and west of Kathmandu in future.
backgroundCn: MHT系统是俯冲的印度板块与欧亚板块之间的一个分离面，承受着约20毫米/年的高收敛速率。记录显示，在中央喜马拉雅弧上发生过几次强震，例如1505年Mw > 8.2的洛穆斯唐地震、1833年Mw 7.7的加德满都地震和1934年Mw 8.2的比哈尔-尼泊尔地震。地震后的瞬态变形是对大地震所产生的应力扰动的机械响应。后震应力松弛的主要机制包括在震后破裂区周边的无震滑动、下地壳和上地幔的粘弹性松弛，以及在断层周围浅层地壳的孔隙弹性反弹。近年来，越来越多的地球物理学家采用三维有限元方法来模拟震后演化，这可以解决一些传统解析或半解析方法所面临的挑战。
research objectiveCn: 我们开发了三维有限元模型，结合下沉的印度板块，以研究2015年Mw 7.8戈尔卡地震后，尼泊尔和南藏地区近5年的GPS数据所揭示的后震变形过程的动态机制。在这项工作中，我们展示了包含下沉印度板块的三维有限元模型（FEM），以约束南藏高原下地壳的流变特性和主滑动面（MHT）的摩擦特性，利用在尼泊尔和南藏地区近5年的密集GPS观测数据。
challengesCn: 然而，所使用的GPS数据要么局限于尼泊尔，要么位于南藏地区离断层数百公里远的地方。在距断层区域约150-250公里（中间场）处几乎没有数据。关于推断的余滑分布和印度-亚洲构造板块边界在西藏下方仍存在若干争议。此外，前述关于戈尔卡地震的后震建模大多采用了均匀或分层弹性半空间中的位错理论的解析或半解析方法。由于研究区内强烈的横向非均匀流变结构，他们的滑动模型可能存在偏差。
methodsCn: 我们最初研究单个应力驱动的余滑和粘弹性松弛所导致的后震变形模式，然后通过仔细评估模拟和观测表面位移之间的误差，来探讨组合机制的贡献。我们使用GAMIT/GLOBK版本10.7处理软件处理原始GPS数据。
datasetCn: 我们还收集了来自中国大陆GPS（cGPS）站点的观察数据，以及在南藏地区7个活动GPS站点（J040、JB54、J339、J030、J337、J038、J338）的未发表数据，这些数据来自中国大地构造运动观测网络（CMONOC）。
findingsCn: 优选的综合模型再现了与戈尔卡地震相关的后震形变，表明近场到中间场的后震位移主要是由震后滑动引起的，发生在震后破裂的下倾部分，而远场形变则主要由南藏地区下地壳和上地幔的粘弹性松弛主导。南藏地区下地壳的稳态粘度估计为3 × 10^18 Pa s，对应的瞬态粘度为3 × 10^17 Pa s。最佳拟合的综合模型表明，约90%的震后滑动在前4年内释放，相关的摩擦参数 a σ = 0.15 MPa。此外，我们发现震后滑动在震后破裂的下倾部分起着重要作用，影响近场和中间场位移之间的权衡。主喜马拉雅滑脱带浅部的震后滑动缺失表明未来在加德满都南部和西部存在潜在的地震危险。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of how GPS data is processed to remove unrelated influences such as seasonal variations and tectonic plate effects when studying earthquake-induced deformation?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个例子，说明如何处理GPS数据以去除与季节变化和构造板块效应等无关的影响，以便研究地震引起的变形？
Example.AnswerEn: To study earthquake-induced deformation, raw GPS data is processed by first obtaining a time series in the ITRF reference frame. Then, corrections are applied to remove unrelated influences such as seasonal variations, annual changes, and tectonic plate effects. A logarithmic function is used to fit the postseismic time series curve, allowing for the calculation of deformation over any time period.
Example.AnswerCn: 为了研究地震引起的变形，首先通过获取国际地球参考框架（ITRF）中的时间序列来处理原始GPS数据。然后，应用修正以去除不相关的影响，如季节变化、年度变化和构造板块效应。使用对数函数拟合后震时间序列曲线，从而可以计算任何时间段内的变形。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when using GPS data to model postseismic deformation in regions with sparse data coverage?
Example.QuestionCn: 在数据覆盖稀疏的地区使用GPS数据建模后震变形时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge in using GPS data to model postseismic deformation is the lack of data in certain regions, such as the approximately 150-250 km intermediate-field from the rupture area in Tibet. This lack of data can lead to controversies regarding the distribution of inferred afterslip and the tectonic plate boundary, potentially causing biases in slip models due to strong lateral heterogeneous rheological structures.
Example.AnswerCn: 使用GPS数据建模后震变形的一个挑战是某些区域缺乏数据，例如从震源区到西藏约150-250公里的中间场。这种数据的缺乏可能导致关于推断的后滑分布和构造板块边界的争议，可能由于强烈的横向非均匀流变结构而导致滑动模型的偏差。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of how combined mechanisms like afterslip and viscoelastic relaxation are evaluated to simulate postseismic deformation?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个示例，说明如何评估后滑和粘弹性松弛等组合机制，以模拟震后变形？
Example.AnswerEn: Combined mechanisms such as afterslip and viscoelastic relaxation are evaluated by investigating the pattern of postseismic deformation from individual stress-driven afterslip and viscoelastic relaxation. The contributions of these combined mechanisms are assessed by meticulously evaluating the misfit between simulated and observed surface displacements, using three-dimensional finite element models to constrain rheological properties and frictional parameters.
Example.AnswerCn: 通过研究个别应力驱动的后滑和粘弹性松弛的后震变形模式，评估了后滑和粘弹性松弛等组合机制。通过仔细评估模拟和观测表面位移之间的误差，利用三维有限元模型来约束流变特性和摩擦参数，从而评估这些组合机制的贡献。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific data processing steps involved in handling GPS data for postseismic deformation analysis?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 处理用于震后变形分析的GPS数据涉及哪些具体的数据处理步骤？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: processing raw GPS data, time series in the ITRF reference frame, correcting for seasonal changes, correcting for interannual variations, correcting for plate effects, fitting postseismic time series curves using logarithmic functions, calculating cumulative deformation through fitted curves
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 处理原始GPS数据，时间序列在ITRF参考框架中，校正季节性变化，校正年际变化，校正板块效应，使用对数函数拟合震后时间序列曲线，通过拟合曲线计算累积变形。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'postseismic deformation' in the context of geophysical studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在地球物理研究中，“震后变形”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Postseismic deformation refers to the mechanical response of mantle and crustal rocks to stress perturbations generated by large earthquakes. It mainly involves aseismic slip in the periphery of the coseismic rupture area, viscoelastic relaxation in the lower crust and upper mantle, and poroelastic rebound in the shallow crust around the fault.
Definition.AnswerCn: 后震变形是指地幔和地壳岩石对大地震产生的应力扰动的机械响应。它主要涉及到在震源区周边的无震滑动、下地壳和上地幔的粘弹性松弛，以及断层周围浅层地壳的孔弹性反弹。

Definition.QuestionEn: How is 'afterslip' characterized in studies of postseismic deformation?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在后震变形的研究中，“后滑”是如何被表征的？
Definition.AnswerEn: Afterslip is characterized as aseismic slip occurring on the downdip of the coseismic rupture, playing a crucial role in postseismic deformation. It is significant in the trade-off between near- and intermediate-field displacements and indicates potential seismic hazards if it is deficient in certain areas, such as the Main Himalayan Thrust.
Definition.AnswerCn: Afterslip 是指在震后破裂的下倾面上发生的无震滑动，它在震后变形中发挥着重要作用。它在近场和中场位移之间的权衡中具有重要意义，并且如果在某些区域（如主喜马拉雅逆断层）不足，可能会指示潜在的地震危险。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the challenges of data collection in the intermediate-field region of the southern Tibet differ from those in Nepal with respect to the Gorkha earthquake postseismic studies?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 南藏中间地区的数据收集挑战与尼泊尔在戈尔卡地震后震后研究中的挑战有什么不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The intermediate-field region in southern Tibet faces challenges due to the lack of data approximately 150–250 km from the rupture area, creating gaps in spatial data collection. In contrast, Nepal has more concentrated GPS data closer to the rupture area, allowing for more detailed local analysis but potentially missing insights from the intermediate-field dynamics that are captured in Tibet.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 南藏的中间场区域面临挑战，因为在距破裂区域约150-250公里的地方缺乏数据，导致空间数据收集存在空白。相比之下，尼泊尔在靠近破裂区域的地方拥有更集中 的GPS数据，这使得局部分析更加详细，但可能会错过在西藏捕捉到的中间场动态的见解。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences between the rheological modeling approaches used in postseismic deformation studies compared to traditional analytic or semi-analytic methods?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 后震变形研究中使用的流变模型方法与传统的解析或半解析方法之间的相似性和差异是什么？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both rheological modeling approaches and traditional analytic methods aim to simulate postseismic deformation, but rheological models, particularly those using three-dimensional finite element methods, can incorporate complex geological structures like subducting slabs and heterogeneous rheological properties, offering more detailed simulations. Traditional analytic methods might simplify these structures, potentially leading to biases due to assumptions of homogeneous or layered elastic half-spaces.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 流变模型方法和传统解析方法都旨在模拟震后变形，但流变模型，特别是使用三维有限元方法的模型，可以纳入复杂的地质结构，如俯冲板块和异质流变特性，从而提供更详细的模拟。传统解析方法可能会简化这些结构，可能由于假设均匀或分层的弹性半空间而导致偏差。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the absence of GPS data at approximately 150 – 250 km from the rupture area impact the interpretation of postseismic deformation patterns?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在距离破裂区域约150-250公里的地方缺乏GPS数据会如何影响对后震变形模式的解释？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The absence of GPS data at approximately 150 – 250 km from the rupture area may lead to incomplete understanding of the intermediate-field postseismic deformation patterns, potentially affecting the accuracy of inferred afterslip distribution and rheological properties. This gap may cause biases in the slip models due to the heterogeneous rheological structure of the study area.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在距断层破裂区约150-250公里的地方缺乏GPS数据，可能导致对中间场后震变形模式的不完整理解，从而影响推断的余滑分布和流变特性准确性。这个空白可能会由于研究区域的异质流变结构而导致滑动模型的偏差。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in interpreting the contributions of individual and combined mechanisms to the postseismic deformation from the observed GPS data?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在解释从观测到的GPS数据中个体和组合机制对后震变形的贡献时，可能面临的挑战有哪些？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Interpreting the contributions of individual and combined mechanisms to postseismic deformation requires meticulous evaluation of the misfit between simulated and observed surface displacements. Challenges include differentiating between the effects of aseismic slip and viscoelastic relaxation, as well as addressing the influence of lateral heterogeneity in the rheological structure, which may introduce biases.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 解释单个和组合机制对后震变形的贡献需要仔细评估模拟和观测表面位移之间的误差。挑战包括区分无震滑动和粘弹性松弛的影响，以及处理横向异质性在流变结构中的影响，这可能会引入偏差。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors lead to the challenges in collecting GPS data for postseismic deformation analysis in regions like Nepal and southern Tibet?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在尼泊尔和南藏等地区，收集GPS数据进行后震变形分析面临的挑战因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Challenges in collecting GPS data for postseismic deformation analysis in Nepal and southern Tibet include the limited availability of data from the intermediate-field region approximately 150 – 250 km from the rupture area, as well as the strong lateral heterogeneous rheological structure in the study area, which may cause biases in slip models.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在尼泊尔和南藏地区，收集GPS数据以进行后震变形分析面临的挑战包括：距离破裂区域约150-250公里的中间场区域数据的有限可用性，以及研究区内强烈的横向非均匀流变结构，这可能导致滑动模型的偏差。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is there a need to correct for seasonal and interannual variations when processing GPS data in postseismic deformation studies?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在后震变形研究中处理GPS数据时，为什么需要对季节性和年际变化进行修正？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Correcting for seasonal and interannual variations is necessary to isolate the deformation caused by the earthquake from other influences, such as plate effects and environmental factors, ensuring that the observed displacements accurately reflect the postseismic deformation.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 纠正季节性和年际变化是必要的，以便将地震引起的变形与其他影响（如板块效应和环境因素）隔离，从而确保观察到的位移准确反映后震变形。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the bias in slip models when using analytic or semi-analytic methods for postseismic modeling in the Gorkha earthquake region?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在使用解析或半解析方法进行戈尔卡地震区域的后震模型时，导致滑移模型偏差的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The bias in slip models arises from the use of analytic or semi-analytic methods in a homogeneous or layered elastic half-space, which do not account for the strong lateral heterogeneous rheological structure of the region, leading to potential inaccuracies in the modeling of postseismic deformation.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 滑移模型中的偏差源于在均匀或分层弹性半空间中使用解析或半解析方法，这些方法未能考虑该区域强烈的横向异质流变结构，从而可能导致后震变形建模的潜在不准确性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of incorporating both continuous and campaign GPS data from different regions on the accuracy and reliability of postseismic deformation models?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 将来自不同地区的连续和活动GPS数据结合在一起，可能对后震变形模型的准确性和可靠性产生哪些潜在影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Incorporating both continuous and campaign GPS data from different regions can enhance the spatial coverage and resolution of postseismic deformation models. However, it may introduce challenges related to data consistency and integration, particularly if the data are from regions with varying distances from the rupture area, such as Nepal and southern Tibet. This can affect the accuracy of inferred deformation patterns and rheological properties.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 结合来自不同地区的连续和活动GPS数据可以增强后震变形模型的空间覆盖和分辨率。然而，这可能会引入与数据一致性和整合相关的挑战，特别是如果数据来自与破裂区域距离不同的地区，如尼泊尔和南藏。这可能会影响推断的变形模式和流变特性准确性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the implications of using three-dimensional finite element models for simulating postseismic deformation compared to traditional analytic or semi-analytic methods?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用三维有限元模型模拟后震变形与传统的解析或半解析方法相比，有哪些影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using three-dimensional finite element models allows for more accurate simulations of postseismic deformation by accommodating complex geological structures and heterogeneous rheological properties. This can improve the understanding of mechanisms like aseismic slip and viscoelastic relaxation, leading to more reliable predictions of deformation patterns. However, it also requires comprehensive and high-quality data inputs, which could be challenging to obtain uniformly across the affected regions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用三维有限元模型可以更准确地模拟后震变形，因为它能够适应复杂的地质结构和异质的流变特性。这可以提高对无震滑动和粘弹性松弛等机制的理解，从而导致对变形模式的更可靠预测。然而，这也需要全面和高质量的数据输入，而在受影响区域均匀获取这些数据可能会面临挑战。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective of developing three-dimensional finite element models incorporating a subducting slab for investigating postseismic deformation processes?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发包含俯冲板块的三维有限元模型以研究后震变形过程的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective is to investigate the dynamic mechanisms of postseismic deformation processes following the 2015 Mw 7.8 Gorkha earthquake, with a focus on constraining the rheological properties of the lower crust in the southern Tibetan Plateau and the frictional properties of the Main Himalayan Thrust (MHT) using dense GPS observations spanning nearly 5 years.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是研究2015年Mw 7.8戈尔卡地震后地震变形过程的动态机制，重点是通过近5年的密集GPS观测，约束南藏区下地壳的流变特性和主要喜马拉雅断层（MHT）的摩擦特性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to address the contributions of combined mechanisms when evaluating postseismic deformation using GPS data?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在使用GPS数据评估后震变形时，考虑综合机制的贡献是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Addressing the contributions of combined mechanisms is important because it allows for meticulous evaluation of the misfit between simulated and observed surface displacements, thereby improving the accuracy of the postseismic deformation model and understanding how different processes like afterslip and viscoelastic relaxation contribute to observed deformations.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 考虑综合机制的贡献是重要的，因为这可以细致评估模拟和观测表面位移之间的差异，从而提高后震变形模型的准确性，并理解像后滑和粘弹性松弛等不同过程如何对观测到的变形产生影响。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the intended benefits of processing raw GPS data using specific software such as GAMIT/GLOBK version 10.7 in the context of postseismic deformation studies?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 处理原始GPS数据使用特定软件如GAMIT/GLOBK版本10.7在后震变形研究中的预期好处是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The intended benefits of using specific software like GAMIT/GLOBK version 10.7 for processing raw GPS data include obtaining precise and reliable time series data in the ITRF reference frame, which is crucial for accurately correcting for external influences and fitting postseismic deformation curves, thereby enhancing the understanding of cumulative postseismic deformations over time.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 使用特定软件如GAMIT/GLOBK版本10.7处理原始GPS数据的预期好处包括获得在ITRF参考框架下的精确和可靠的时间序列数据，这对于准确校正外部影响和拟合后震变形曲线至关重要，从而增强对随时间累积的后震变形的理解。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are necessary to correct for influences unrelated to the Nepal earthquake, such as seasonal variations or plate effects, during the GPS data processing?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为纠正与尼泊尔地震无关的影响，例如季节变化或板块效应，在GPS数据处理过程中需要采取哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedures involve processing the raw GPS data to obtain time series in the ITRF reference frame, followed by correcting for other influences unrelated to the Nepal earthquake, like seasonal variations, interannual changes, and plate effects.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 这些程序涉及处理原始GPS数据，以获得ITRF参考框架中的时间序列，然后纠正与尼泊尔地震无关的其他影响，如季节变化、年际变化和板块效应。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can three-dimensional finite element models be employed to simulate postseismic deformation and what specific data processing steps are required to evaluate the fit between simulated and observed displacements?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 三维有限元模型如何用于模拟震后变形，以及评估模拟位移与观测位移之间拟合度所需的具体数据处理步骤是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Three-dimensional finite element models are used by incorporating a subducting India slab to simulate postseismic deformation. The data processing steps include initially evaluating the pattern of postseismic deformation from individual stress-driven afterslip and viscoelastic relaxation, and meticulously assessing the misfit between the simulated and observed surface displacements using GAMIT/GLOBK version 10.7 processing software.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 三维有限元模型通过引入俯冲的印度板块来模拟后震形变。数据处理步骤包括最初评估来自单个应力驱动的后滑和粘弹性松弛的后震形变模式，并仔细评估使用GAMIT/GLOBK版本10.7处理软件模拟和观测表面位移之间的误差。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methods are used to collect GPS observations in challenging terrains like southern Tibet and how is unpublished data incorporated into the analysis?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在像南藏这样的复杂地形中，收集GPS观测数据的方法有哪些？未发表的数据是如何纳入分析中的？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Methods include using continuous GPS (cGPS) stations and campaign GPS stations for data collection in challenging terrains like southern Tibet. Unpublished data from 7 campaign GPS stations in the region are incorporated into the analysis alongside observations from the Crustal Movement Observation Network of China (CMONOC).
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 方法包括使用连续GPS（cGPS）站和在南藏等复杂地形中进行数据收集的临时GPS站。分析中结合了来自该地区7个临时GPS站的未发表数据，以及来自中国地壳运动观测网络（CMONOC）的观测数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data processing techniques enable the accurate correction of seasonal and interannual variations when analyzing GPS data for postseismic deformation studies?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些数据处理技术能够在分析GPS数据以进行后震变形研究时，准确校正季节性和年际变化？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The data processing involves initially handling raw GPS data to obtain time series in the ITRF reference frame, followed by correcting for influences unrelated to the earthquake, such as seasonal and interannual variations, using sophisticated data processing software like GAMIT/GLOBK.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 数据处理首先涉及处理原始GPS数据，以获得ITRF参考框架中的时间序列，然后使用像GAMIT/GLOBK这样的高级数据处理软件，纠正与地震无关的影响，例如季节性和年际变化。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might data collection methods for postseismic deformation following large earthquakes, such as the 2015 Mw 7.8 Gorkha earthquake, face challenges in intermediate-field regions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在大型地震后，例如2015年Mw 7.8的戈尔卡地震，后震变形的数据收集方法在中间场区域可能面临挑战的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The employed GPS data were either confined in Nepal or located hundreds of kilometers away from the rupture in the southern Tibet region. There was almost no data at approximately 150 – 250 km from the rupture area in Tibet, leading to challenges in data collection for these intermediate-field regions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 所使用的GPS数据要么局限于尼泊尔，要么位于南藏地区离断层几百公里远的地方。在距断层区域约150-250公里的地方几乎没有数据，这给这些中间场区域的数据收集带来了挑战。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the anticipated challenges in using three-dimensional finite element models to simulate postseismic deformation processes in areas with a strong lateral heterogeneous rheological structure?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在具有强侧向非均匀流变结构的区域中，使用三维有限元模型模拟后震变形过程时预期会面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Most of the postseismic modeling effects of the Gorkha earthquake adopted analytic or semi-analytic methods of dislocations theory in a homogeneous or layered elastic half-space. There may be a bias in their slip models due to the strong lateral heterogeneous rheological structure in the study area, posing challenges in achieving accurate simulation results.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 大多数关于戈尔卡地震的后震模拟效应采用了均匀或分层弹性半空间中的位错理论的解析或半解析方法。由于研究区域内强烈的横向非均匀流变结构，可能导致它们的滑动模型存在偏差，从而在实现准确的模拟结果方面面临挑战。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your evaluation of the challenges faced in combining different data sources for accurate postseismic deformation modeling in the context of limited intermediate-field data availability?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在中间场数据可用性有限的情况下，结合不同数据源以实现准确的后震变形建模所面临的挑战的评估是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Combining different data sources in postseismic deformation modeling presents challenges due to the limited availability of intermediate-field data, which creates gaps in coverage and may lead to biases in the slip models. The strong lateral heterogeneous rheological structure in the study area further complicates the integration of data, suggesting a need for more comprehensive data collection strategies to improve model accuracy.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在后震变形建模中，结合不同的数据源面临挑战，因为中间场数据的可用性有限，这导致覆盖范围存在空白，并可能导致滑动模型的偏差。研究区域内强烈的横向非均匀流变结构进一步复杂化了数据的整合，这表明需要更全面的数据收集策略以提高模型的准确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do you perceive the role of advanced three-dimensional finite element models in enhancing the understanding of postseismic deformation mechanisms compared to traditional methods?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您如何看待先进的三维有限元模型在增强对后震变形机制理解方面的作用，相较于传统方法？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Advanced three-dimensional finite element models significantly enhance the understanding of postseismic deformation mechanisms by addressing limitations of traditional analytical or semi-analytical methods. They allow for a more detailed representation of the subducting Indian slab and the rheological properties of the lower crust, providing insights into the complex interactions that drive postseismic processes.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 先进的三维有限元模型显著增强了对后震变形机制的理解，克服了传统解析或半解析方法的局限性。它们能够更详细地表征俯冲的印度板块和下地壳的流变特性，为驱动后震过程的复杂相互作用提供了深入的见解。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, how could the integration of additional GPS station data improve the interpretation of afterslip and viscoelastic relaxation in postseismic studies?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在我看来，额外的GPS站点数据的整合可以如何改善后震研究中对后滑和粘弹性松弛的解释？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The integration of additional GPS station data could substantially improve the interpretation of afterslip and viscoelastic relaxation by filling data gaps, particularly in the intermediate-field regions. This would provide a more complete dataset for accurately modeling the spatial distribution of postseismic deformation, enhancing the reliability of the findings and reducing potential biases related to data scarcity.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 额外GPS站点数据的整合可以显著改善对后滑和粘弹性松弛的解释，通过填补数据空白，特别是在中间场区域。这将提供更完整的数据集，以准确建模后震变形的空间分布，提高研究结果的可靠性，并减少与数据稀缺相关的潜在偏差。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the processes involved in correcting GPS data for influences unrelated to the Nepal earthquake, such as seasonal variations or plate effects.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定纠正与尼泊尔地震无关的GPS数据所涉及的过程，例如季节变化或板块效应。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The GPS data is processed by first obtaining time series in the ITRF reference frame and then correcting for unrelated influences like seasonal and interannual variations, and plate effects, to isolate the postseismic deformation related to the Nepal earthquake.
Assertion.AnswerCn: GPS数据的处理首先是在ITRF参考框架中获取时间序列，然后纠正与季节性和年际变化以及板块效应无关的影响，以孤立与尼泊尔地震相关的后震变形。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please investigate how GPS data processing techniques have evolved in recent years to improve the accuracy of postseismic deformation measurements in tectonically active regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请调查近年来GPS数据处理技术如何发展，以提高在构造活跃地区后震变形测量的准确性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The GPS data processing for postseismic deformation measurements involves using software like GAMIT/GLOBK to handle raw data. The process includes correcting for unrelated influences such as seasonal changes and plate effects to achieve accuracy. Recent techniques leverage three-dimensional finite-element models to simulate postseismic deformation and address the challenges posed by strong lateral heterogeneous rheological structures.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: GPS数据处理用于后震形变测量，涉及使用GAMIT/GLOBK等软件处理原始数据。该过程包括纠正季节变化和板块效应等无关影响，以实现准确性。最近的技术利用三维有限元模型模拟后震形变，并解决强侧向非均匀流变结构带来的挑战。
